title: NTUF salutes and expresses sincere gratitude to BJMP personnel: Sirs Roberto Ayunon, Jr., Brendon Saldaen, and Ceasar Panganiban, and to the rest of your team. Your active role in this mission is highly commendable.
Gawad Kalinga and NTU Foundation, kindred organizations in nation-building, once again partner for the NTUF Greenzone Movement as a part of GK's country-wide Bayani Challenge.
NTU Foundation and NTU Call and Service Center partnered for another display of Sharing Hope for Christmas
